author: Special Correspondent
text:
A mobile van will tour all colleges across the district to create awareness among students about the importance of exercising franchise during the forthcoming election, said T. Karikalan, District Collector.

Inaugurating the Systematic Voters Education and Electoral Participation (SVEEP) here on Friday, the Collector said the district administration had made all arrangements for ensuring free and fair poll. The first-time voters should exercise their franchise.

Signature campaign

Earlier, the Collector affixed his signature on the SVEEP mobile van, marking the inauguration of the signature campaign.

Students would affix their signature on the mobile van. The Collector said that 20 sector officials had been nominated for the election. Each official would be in-charge of eight to ten polling booths for effective monitoring of election process.

Mangalam Dinesh, Additional Collector, Geetha, and Returning Officer Santha Williams, Nodal officer, were present.
title: SVEEP commences in Karaikal
